title: Fictional Women Around the World: Heather Mason
itunes:title: Fictional Women Around the World: Heather Mason
description:
A teen walks into a mall in Silent Hill and learns she is the literal stuff of nightmares summoned by a cult. Silent Hill 3's Heather Mason handles hell with poise and style.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
